triviaMaze.room

Interface IRoomLink

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoomLink

    public interface IRoomLink
extends java.io.Serializable
    The interface which represents links between rooms which can contain the state that they have.
    Author:
    Jacob Erdman, Randy Heckard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void answer()
      Sets the link to answered
      void disable()
      Sets the link as disabled
      IRoom getRoom()
      Gets the room at the other end of the link
      boolean isAnswered()
      Whether or not the link is answered
      boolean isEnabled()
      Whether or not the link is enabled
      void setRoom(IRoom room)
      Sets the room at the other end of the link

    • Method Detail

      • isEnabled

        Whether or not the link is enabled
        Returns:

        boolean isAnswered()
        Whether or not the link is answered
        Returns:
        Returns a Boolean representing whether or not the link is enabled
